nodes.text: This carbon-freezing chamber was in a tower hangar of the Jedi Temple.

During the Clone Wars, the Jedi Temple of Coruscant had a carbon freezing chamber in one of the hangars. Around 21 BBY a male Ugnaught technician, Erk Zallis was working at this chamber. Before the mission to the Citadel, an infamous Separatist's prison, several Jedi and their clone troopers were carbon freezed to infiltrate safely into the planet Lola Sayu. Because Osi Sobeck, a warden of the Citadel, and his tactical droid K2-B4 scanned every ship toward the prison for lifeforms, the Republic elite team had to avoid the scan by being frozen.
